title: Capucha caída
desc: In "Capucha Caída," the hooded figure—an icon of protection and desire during Chile’s 2019 social uprising—faces solitude and decay in the aftermath of the pandemic and political shifts. Cris Gómez and Jorge Díaz engage in dialogue about his fall and the transformation of heroes in society. This short film reflects on the ephemerality of symbols and the influence of politics on the perception and fate of people.
